title: build: test timed out
body:
by **rounin.urashima**: 
This is some what a continuation of issue #3911:

What does 'go version' print?

rounin@:~$            go version
go version devel +262af7c32d11 Tue Mar 18 21:12:00 2014 +0900 linux/arm

What steps reproduce the problem?

1. hg clone -u release https://code.google.com/p/go
2. cd go/src
3. hg pull
4. hg update
5. hg update tip
6. ./all.bash

What happened?


# Testing packages.
?       cmd/addr2line   [no test files]
?       cmd/cgo [no test files]
ok      cmd/fix 1.495s
ok      cmd/go  1.770s
ok      cmd/gofmt       2.569s
ok      cmd/link        1.607s
?       cmd/nm  [no test files]
ok      cmd/pack        114.674s
?       cmd/yacc        [no test files]
ok      archive/tar     0.910s
ok      archive/zip     78.414s
ok      bufio   5.299s
ok      bytes   6.654s
ok      compress/bzip2  3.407s
ok      compress/flate  29.916s
ok      compress/gzip   1.030s
ok      compress/lzw    3.849s
ok      compress/zlib   135.799s
ok      container/heap  2.232s
ok      container/list  5.856s
ok      container/ring  4.883s
?       crypto  [no test files]
ok      crypto/aes      2.535s
ok      crypto/cipher   7.107s
ok      crypto/des      4.962s
ok      crypto/dsa      5.333s
ok      crypto/ecdsa    9.179s
ok      crypto/elliptic 6.668s
ok      crypto/hmac     2.367s
ok      crypto/md5      1.864s
ok      crypto/rand     2.567s
ok      crypto/rc4      12.167s
ok      crypto/rsa      29.145s
ok      crypto/sha1     6.430s
ok      crypto/sha256   1.960s
ok      crypto/sha512   1.849s
ok      crypto/subtle   7.198s
ok      crypto/tls      120.446s
panic: test timed out after 6m0s

goroutine 43 [running]:
runtime.panic(0x18f3e8, 0x10670028)
        /home/rounin/go/src/pkg/runtime/panic.c:279 +0x1a0
testing.funcÂ·008()
        /home/rounin/go/src/pkg/testing/testing.go:628 +0x134
created by time.goFunc
        /home/rounin/go/src/pkg/time/sleep.go:121 +0x58

goroutine 16 [chan receive, 3 minutes]:
testing.RunTests(0x270f0c, 0x323a18, 0x18, 0x18, 0x1)
rounin@:~$            go version
go version devel +262af7c32d11 Tue Mar 18 21:12:00 2014 +0900 linux/arm



What should have happened instead?

ALL TESTS PASSED

---
